description:
Yuu, Shunsuke, Ryo, and Seiichirou follow after Kouta and the friends have a very frank and passionate exchange. Through this, Kouta finally realizes just how he wants to sparkle. The day of the school festival and the musical finally arrives. Everything is set for the boys to tackle the musical`s performance. Through their performance on stage they the story of how "I" became "we".
Source: crunchyroll
